website_summaries.verdict: A decent, quality replacement seat with a high back that comes at a good price.
pros: Plastic hinges are very sturdy and hold up well over time
Comfortable chair even after hours of sitting
cons: Some of the options provide a fabric covering that will hold the water in the weather

customer_reviews.title: Firm Seat
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my Tracker Pro 160 front seat. The original 2013 seat padding was settling out and about 2 hours of fishing my rear was wedged in the back of the seat. These seats are firm and the back is straight. Now my foot is straight over the trolling motor. I like the firmness but some people might not like it. I love the lock down position . No strap to tear after a few years of use. Seats feel heavy. Will be buying another when the price gets back down to around $75. Will not pay $100 to $150 for a boat seat.
customer_reviews.author: ber

customer_reviews.title: Poor Engineering
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this seat for my Gheenoe. The first time I used it, it broke and nearly caused me to flip the boat over. Overall the seat was comfortable and from what I could tell, should have been sturdy as well. Unfortunately, this was not so. They should have engineered the hinge area with either a higher grade plastic or possibly a non-corrosive metal. I DO NOT recommend this seat unless changes are made in the engineering of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Like sitting on a wet sponge?
customer_reviews.text: These seats are like nothing I've ever encountered. If it rains once within 365 days and these seats are left outside youd better like having a wet a$$. Cheaper seats at least dry out after a few days. These are incredible, they hold water like a cactus. I contacted the company and asked if they made a cover for them. They dont. If you become stranded in the Mojave and are dying of thirst, look for one of these seats and cut it open. It may just save your life.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Speckels

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment. Looks nice at first, but the materials are junk. The seams split on the seat first and then split on the back.
customer_reviews.author: JC in MN

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat.
customer_reviews.text: These seats are nice and comfortable. I can't speak to how long they stay wet as I haven't yet had occasion to be caught in the rain. the mount does have a front and a back which introduces a little lean. If you mount it backwards the seat is too upright and uncomfortable. I have seen comments to this effect about this product. I suspect that was their problem. Mounted correctly is sits very nice.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Missing bolt cover but still better then i thought
customer_reviews.text: First seat i got was perfect second is missing a plastic bolt cover (see pic) Also bottom mount has 6 bolt holes but only comes with 4 bolts no big deal but my mounting plate could have used all 6. Overall its better then i thought it was going to be. As for the straight up position other people mentioned, mine only does that when i swing the seat 180° But while sitting forwards its good. The american flag tag is a nice touch. Please contact me about the bolt cover
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have two on pedestals, I am going to get two more for the deck seats as well. fished all day with no discomfort, i'm 5'10" 225 and was comfortable all day, the only issue I had was if you lean back to hard the hinge would snap out of place, only happened once, just so that you aware of happening. other than that wonderful seat.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat - but watch your fingers
customer_reviews.text: I like this seat - quite comfortable, very attractive, and appropriately priced. One drawback is the release. When folded down it locks shut - which is nice. Not so nice is the release mechanism, which involves depressing a button-type lever that is very close to the pivot point, which creates a bit of a pinch point, especially if a child (or your wife) attempts the release. No trouble once you get used to it, but it's almost always unpleasant the first time around.
customer_reviews.author: HeavyD

customer_reviews.title: broke first use
customer_reviews.text: cheap, broke first time I sat in it. Is taking a week to get replaced. wish I would have bought it somewhere I could return it without waiting for a week.
customer_reviews.author: anthony goddard

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these to anyone looking for good seats in your boat
customer_reviews.text: Look good sit good comfortable feel good. Recommend them to anyone. Light gray part does show dirt but if you whipe them down with a good cleaner then a protecter after each trip to the lake they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie blair

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seats
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for your money. The seat is very nice and comfortable. It enhances my boat and the fold down feature is an added bonus. Would recommend to anyone looking for a replacement seat.
customer_reviews.author: V Mac

customer_reviews.title: Should have
customer_reviews.text: The seat looked amazing. I was very impressed with everything until I went to mount the seat on my standard size swivel bracket. With the very first screw I felt something give, it was the threaded insert in the base. Could not even get the screw back out. It's a shame that something that nice has those kind of problems. I saw several reviews where that happened. SHOULD HAVE PAID BETTER ATTENTION.
customer_reviews.author: judy mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boat seat. Spend the money - you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: After buying a set of cheaper boat seats, I definitely agree you get what you pay for. These seats shipped incredibly quickly and are by far the most comfortable boat seats I have ever used. I am 220 lbs and they gave me great support during a recent 5 hour fishing trip. The seats were also very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stripped bolt holes
customer_reviews.text: Stripped bolt holes when mounting pedestal. Returned for a replacement. Honestly not the quality expected for a expensive seat.
customer_reviews.author: James V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooooo much more comfortable than those cheaper ones. Don’t disappoint yourself, spend the extra money your Bum will thank you after a long day on the water. Strong, sturdy and great back support for some bigger people; can handle the weight.
customer_reviews.author: JKraanic

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.  Doesn't discolor. Withstands weather well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Very comfortable Love that the seats lock into down position.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent replacement for a seat that had deteriorated badly as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent replacement for a seat that had deteriorated badly as well as having a very weak design for a hinge. While it probably will not make the fish bit...it will make fishing more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is true about the threads being damaged. I had to use a 1/4-20 thread chaser (tap) on 2 of the encased nuts molded into the chair. I think it's the manufacturing process that snarls them up. Very sturdy once they were installed. I am 260lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good look, strong & well made!
customer_reviews.text: Well made seats! I am adding two to match the seat in my boat that are 18 years old. My original seats are still in great shape so that's why I stayed with the Tempress brand.
customer_reviews.author: GeoSteve

customer_reviews.title: great seat
customer_reviews.text: I go to Mexico fishing on pangas with fiberglass seats so this seat will work great for a long day of fishing
customer_reviews.author: armando hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good if you like firm and supporting seats.
customer_reviews.text: Very firm seat after moving away from Alumacraft blastoff seats. The hinge design seems to be must sturdier than the standard two metal hinges. Overall I'd consider it a firm seat but great when taking some rough riding Conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These seats are very uncomfortable on my low back after several hours of fishing
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: if you like to lean back even just a little bit I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very upright chair, if you like to lean back even just a little bit I would suggest looking at something different. They fit my need exactly but I had to get creative to make them more comfortable for me, I am 6'6" and i like to lean back a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Child

customer_reviews.title: Great sight seeing boat seat
customer_reviews.text: Great cushioned seat and made very well, not suitable for bass fishing. Thick cushioning actually interfered with my hook set.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby J.

customer_reviews.title: ... seat and it was delivered on time and in good condition. The seat folds in half and stays ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my Tempress Navistyle seat and it was delivered on time and in good condition. The seat folds in half and stays in the folded position, held by a plastic button on the back of the seat. The cushions appear to be good quality and the colors are correct. The cushions sit on a plastic seat/back connected with hinge. The bottom of the plastic portion of the seat is set up to bolt to a standard pedestal/slide. I am using a Wise 8WD1501 pedestal/slide that bolted right on, no issues. This combination fits together, and works well. Overall, I felt this was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Spectator

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast shipping and great quality. Would highly recommend these seats!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah martin

customer_reviews.title: Bad construction
customer_reviews.text: Everything I have purchased from amazon has been great. This product is the second one they sent me. The first one, one of the front screw bosses came loose when installing base. Ordered a replacement and the second one same thing happened, just different boss. I am a auto mechanic and I know how to assemble things. This is a poorly made base.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: It worked great !!
customer_reviews.text: Love the seat and i am a big person and the work great.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Seat
customer_reviews.text: Finally lost the last nice seat out of my Express bass boat. These seats are well built and have a lock down while underway...real cool! The color matches my boat color too.
customer_reviews.author: Settnstill

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks, my wife says it is comfortable but not as soft as the older one. Will have to see how it holds up over time and exposure to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Dan DeBruin

customer_reviews.title: I had to send back 2 of the 3 seats ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to send back 2 of the 3 seats I ordered. Cheap product plastic hinges. Would not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: What a very nice looking seats and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: What a very nice looking seats and very comfortable. Glad I spent the extra money and bought good seats, you get what you pay for and these are great seats !!!
customer_reviews.author: chatch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: 3rd boat I've used this seat in and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: wayne willard

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable seats
customer_reviews.text: Was received in perfect condition. Love, love these seats. Was completely satisfied with product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: GA Peach

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: I could feel the quality of the seat when I took it out of the box. This seat is much better made than some others that I tried previously. I think this seat is going to be a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores E Puthoff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Seats nice. Had to exchange one but new one good.
customer_reviews.author: jae

customer_reviews.title: Durable boat seat for the Kenai River
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this seat. It is sturdy, has good cushions and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: bananaminion

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Great seat, high quality. Good pricing and the high back is extra comfortable. Foam seems to be breaking in nicely; heavy duty stitching and fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Nickels

customer_reviews.title: Nut stripped out without any torque applied.
customer_reviews.text: Anchor nut stripped before bolt was half way in with very little torque applied. Glad it happened right now while I could still return it to amazon. Spent extra money to buy this and it is clearly cheaper made than my old wise seat.
customer_reviews.author: Blewis0080

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, I like the fact that the seat stays ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I like the fact that the seat stays locked while traveling. I keep a cover over seat so it doesn’t get wet.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome American Made Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome American Made Quality.Put in my 16 ft Jon Boat to replace cheaper 4 year old seats.Super comfortable,with my bad back.They do flex back when sitting,while keeping support.The lock down feature is nice.Bought 2 getting 1 more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a comfortable seat for not a huge amount of money
customer_reviews.text: Replacing the existing seats in my boat with new ones was a hard decision. I wanted a comfortable seat for not a huge amount of money. A hundred dollars times 4 is an investment. I am glad I picked these seats. Comfortable, well built, and durable (my old ones were 10 plus years old). A good seat for a good price. No metal to bend, no straps or snaps to rust and let loose. Great design and they look great too. You can't go wrong with these. The only reason people complain about the seats not sitting back is because they are used to the hinges that are bent. Don't hesitate, buy these, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: Mounting the seat on the existing swivel was a "piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounting the seat on the existing swivel was a "piece of cake". The previous seat rubbed against the boat seat and actually wore a groove in the wood. The base on the Tempress extends about 1/2" more than the old seat resulting in total elimination of all rubbing. This seat is on a boat that is rented out nearly ever week of the summer and I won't be expecting to be replacing it at the end of every season as I have in the past.
customer_reviews.author: John Kleive

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking - comfortable seat. I really like the way the locking feature works.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The seat lean too far forward and is not adjustable therefore there's no lower lumbar support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soaks up water.
customer_reviews.text: Nice seat sturdy and comfortable, however when left out in the rain it soaks up water and retains it for weeks and weeks! Then your rear end gets wet when you sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfortable than mid height boat seat I had in boat before this one, going to buy another for the front of the boat now.
customer_reviews.author: Oconee Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very well made seats and the built in locking mechanism is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Good value seat. Issues others have no problem.
customer_reviews.text: Seal the seams and buy 3 degree tilt swivels and all problems with these solved. They are a bit narrow but a good value.
customer_reviews.author: wmp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it installed, now waiting until the next trip out to see how it feels after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: ... not installed yet( boat still in storage) but very Happy with
customer_reviews.text: Have not installed yet( boat still in storage) but very Happy with construction
customer_reviews.author: Evad

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Watch your finger when releasing the lock, if you're not careful you'll give yourself a little pinch! other than that, these seats are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: martingarrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This seat is an incredible value and very well built for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rosa

customer_reviews.title: value boatseat for the money
customer_reviews.text: This boatseat worked very well for a replacement. Bolt pattern worked perfect with my pedistal
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: and I'm very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my 17' lund fishing boat, and I'm very pleased with the quality, fit,and finish. I had Stearns $50 variety seats which were very uncomfortable with no back support. These have rigid support, much better posture for your back.I have had several back surgeries, and fusions. For the last 3 yrs I have almost given up on fishing due to being in so much pain.I hope to once again start enjoying something I love to do,and these seats will definitely help me accomplish this.I used them for the first time today,and I am very happy I decided to spend a little extra for this great (USA made) product.I will be purchasing 2 more very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Wolters

customer_reviews.title: hingesare too weak feels like you will go over backwards if you lean back to much.
customer_reviews.text: weak back hinge and not water proof would never buy again replaced and throw away garabage
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: One awesome fishing seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good seat! Well constructed with quality components! Plus there attractive and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: TurboFred

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are nice seat, the only thing I do not like is they are straight up and down ,can not lean back and relax.
customer_reviews.author: F.B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, great look and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality,great look and fast shipping. Would have rated 5 stars but seat is very straight and don't think they will be comfortable for a day of fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA top quality and very comfortable worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and very comfortable! Much better than my stock boat seats doesn't recline back with you sits straight up. Lots of padding.
customer_reviews.author: Victor G. McGregory

customer_reviews.title: Great seats!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic seat. Way better than the WISE seats you find more commonly. Very sturdy and comfortable. Designed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: uncomfortable, no recline in back, pushing me forward, not able to relax
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seats! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great seats! Well worth the money, made in the USA and very high quality. Debated over these seats for a long time and finally dropped the money for them, and I'm glad I did! These seats don't adjust but keep you in a comfortable upright position. High back seats are a must, and fishing all day out of these seats is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Sam T.

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use them!
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be a very good seat! Can't wait to use them! Locking mechanism is kind of odd but I should get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Nice well made seats at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice well made seats at a great price. I have been using them on commercial fishing boat for last 4 months, and they hold up great. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: ... seats for a number of years and have always liked them.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Tempress seats for a number of years and have always liked them.
customer_reviews.author: poop deck pappy

product_meta.title: Tempress NaviStyle High Back Seat
feature_bullets: High-impact plastic frame; UV and abrasion-resistant polyester thread
Comfort Style panels with lumbar support
No pinch, lockiing fold down hinge system
